"You're right, Dounia. Since you have made your choice," Pulcheria Alexandrovna said, "I will feel better. I don't like hiding things or lying. It's better to know the whole truth... Pyotr Petrovitch can be angry or not, it doesn't matter now!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pulcheria Alexandrovna expresses relief at Dounia's decision, emphasizing the importance of honesty over concealment.
